/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Modern buildings rise in the background, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding to the overall brightness of the scene.
